properties.areaDesc: Southeast Warren; Northern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 8:55AM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow and sleet accumulations of a
dusting and ice accumulations of a trace to less than one tenth
of an inch.

* WHERE...Northern Saratoga, Northern Washington, Southeast
Warren and Southern Washington Counties.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light mix of sleet and freezing rain
may produce locally slippery travel through early this
afternoon.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
